content.p: This page lists selected resources for Oceania including sources of vacancies as well as information on living and working in particular countries. While we do not have country-specific expertise, our staff can offer advice on putting together an effective job-hunting strategy to seek work abroad. We subscribe to an international careers information package called GoinGlobal. You can access GoinGlobal free as a UoN student or graduate. GoinGlobal contains: Log in to MyCareer for access to GoinGlobal If you have any problems logging into MyCareer, please email our team. Use additional sources of vacancies and country guides selected by our staff for more information on job markets and opportunities abroad. Cturtle Job opportunities around the world Foreign and Commonwealth Office (FCO) Listing of foreign embassies in the UK, and visa and travel information GradAustralia.com.au The top 100 graduate employers in Australia Jooble - Job opportunities across the world Prospects Careers resources for Australia and New Zealand Seek Job site in Australia TARGETjobs Careers resources for Australia and New Zealand World Chambers Network (WCN) Database of chambers of commerce and boards of trade around the world telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
